backend/main.mo: Backend actor managing user profiles with access control and handling contact form submissions including WhatsApp notification attempts.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two ContactPage-related features, their affected files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one-line summaries for numerous frontend files across layout, pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining global OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the app root and main React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with main routes wrapped in the SiteLayout component.
frontend/src/components/forms/Internatio: React component for country-selectable international phone input using custom UI components.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component showing branding, navigation links, contact section, and dynamic attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header navigation with logo, desktop links, and a mobile toggle menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper adding header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/marketing/CtaBlo: Marketing CTA block with title, description, and primary/secondary action buttons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FaqAcc: Expandable FAQ accordion listing common questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/marketing/IconBu: Displays a grid of benefits with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/PlanCa: Pricing plan card with features, pricing details, and CTA, supporting a 'popular' highlight state.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Proble: Shows a list of common business problems styled with destructive indicators.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Service description card outlining what it is, why it matters, and its business impact.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Social: Section showcasing testimonials and a case study with before/after metrics.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ThreeS: Displays a three-step process with icons, numbers, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ValueP: Grid of value propositions with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Whatsa: WhatsApp action button linking to a chat URL with customizable label.
frontend/src/config/site.ts: Defines site metadata, WhatsApp/contact details, and CTA labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactForm.ts: Provides a mutation hook to submit contact form data through the actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, identity loading, and login state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future query hooks using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining global styles, color variables, dark mode, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root and wraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, value props, and marketing content using site configuration.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements the contact form with backend submission, WhatsApp link generation, and popupâ€‘safe window handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page rendering hero content, benefits, pricing plans, and multiple marketing components for lead-generation automation.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Displays tiered pricing plans, ROI points, and marketing sections with PlanCards and CTA components.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a list of service offerings with descriptions and impacts, wrapped in a marketing-focused layout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappLink.ts: Generates WhatsApp deep links and formats contact form data into a structured WhatsApp message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, containers, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing WhatsApp popup-blocking issues, existing feature requirements, and architectural notes.
